instructions_to_main_agent: 2. FONTS: Import 'Playfair Display', 'Inter', and 'JetBrains Mono' from Google Fonts in index.css.
3. THEME: Implement the 'Jewel & Luxury' color palette in tailwind.config.js. Do not use default shadcn colors.
4. LAYOUT: Use the 'Tetris Grid' for the Landing Page and 'Control Room Grid' for the Dashboard.
5. COMPONENTS: Build a custom 'VideoRecorder' component using the browser MediaStream API. Do not rely on external heavy libraries if possible.
6. REPORT: The Report Page is the core value. It must look like a high-end PDF printout but interactive. Use 'recharts' for the radar charts (EP Score).
7. SIMULATOR: Create a card-based interface for the 6 scenarios. Use 'framer-motion' for card flips/transitions.
8. AUTH: Implement Google Sign-In and JWT. Use a split-screen layout for Auth pages (Image Left, Form Right).
9. UNIVERSAL: Apply 'lenis' for smooth scrolling on the marketing pages.
10. ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure all text meets APCA contrast standards. Use 'data-testid' on all interactive elements.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic gradients, no centered text blocks without purpose.
Micro-Interactions: Every button must have a hover state (scale, color shift, shadow).
Spacing: Use 'p-8' or 'p-12' where you would normally use 'p-4'. Luxury is space.
Dark Mode: Ensure the dashboard looks like a Bloomberg Terminal - high contrast, dark background, neon data.
Glassmorphism: Use it for the sticky header and modal overlays, but keep it subtle (blur-xl, white/10).
